```js  { "fakeBrowser": true }
<div style={{ display: 'flex', flexDirection: 'column' }}>
    <Menu mode="horizontal">
        <Menu.Item><Link to="/users/">Users</Link></Menu.Item>
        <Menu.Item><Link to="/products/">Products</Link></Menu.Item>
    </Menu>
    <div>
        <Breadcrumbs>
            <Breadcrumb to="/">Home</Breadcrumb>
        </Breadcrumbs>
        <Route
            path="/users/"
            render={({ match }) => (
                <div>
                    <Breadcrumb to={match.url}>Users</Breadcrumb>
                    <h3>Users</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li><Link to={appendToUrl(match.url, 1)}>User 1</Link></li>
                        <li><Link to={appendToUrl(match.url, 2)}>User 2</Link></li>
                    </ul>
                    <Route
                        path={`${match.path}:id/`}
                        render={({ match: { params } }) => (
                            <div>
                                <hr />
                                <Breadcrumb>User {params.id}</Breadcrumb>
                                <p>Viewing details for user {params.id}</p>
                            </div>
                        )}
                    />
                </div>
            )}
        />
        <Route
            path="/products/"
            render={({ match }) => (
                <div>
                    <Breadcrumb to={match.url}>Products</Breadcrumb>
                    <h3>Products</h3>
                    <ul>
                        <li><Link to={appendToUrl(match.url, 1)}>Product 1</Link></li>
                        <li><Link to={appendToUrl(match.url, 2)}>Product 2</Link></li>
                    </ul>
                    <Route
                        path={`${match.path}:id/`}
                        render={({ match: { params } }) => (
                            <div>
                                <hr />
                                <Breadcrumb>Product {params.id}</Breadcrumb>
                                <p>Viewing details for Product {params.id}</p>
                            </div>
                        )}
                    />

                </div>
            )}
        />
    </div>
</div>
```
